Basics of Espruino JavaScript

Espruino Github Espruino is a JavaScript interpreter for microcontrollers.

  • JavaScript

Espruino Web IDE

Web IDE

Lets run Hello World

console.log("Hello World!);

Now I would recommend you to play around with this JS interpreter. Espruino aims to almost mimic Node.js*

Connecting to Wifi

var ssid = 'YOUR_SSID';
var password = 'YOUR_SSID_PASSWORD';

var wifi = require('Wifi');
wifi.connect(ssid, {password: password}, function() {
    console.log('Connected to Wifi.  IP address is:', wifi.getIP().ip);
    wifi.save(); // Next reboot will auto-connect
});
